column1: Section 11A read with Section 57 of the Births and Deaths Registration Act No. 40 of
Where a registration entry is made in triplicate in accordance with provisions of this
Act by the registrar of a division or by a District Registrar or by an Additional District
Registrar on particulars furnished by an informant, such registrar or District Registrar
or Additional District Registrar shall forthwith, free of charge, deliver or transmit by
post to such informant, the third copy of that registration entry.”
